title: Bodies Found in Container in TN? No, It’s From Pak’s 2015 Heatwave
subtitle: Tamil Nadu Child Lifters Viral Video Fact-Check: A video, circulating on social media, claims Tamil Nadu police found dead bodies of children from a container and implies that their organs like kidney and liver have been removed.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
A video, circulating on social media, claims that the Tamil Nadu police has found dead bodies of children from a container and that these bodies were missing organs.

The Quint received the video on WhatsApp from a reader asking for its authenticity to be verified.

The one-minute three-second video is a compilation of multiple images and has a message written in Gujarati which loosely translates to “Take care of your children and contact the police if something like this happens”.
